STOP in line 99

10 (1) LET P = 3.14159
20 (1) PRINT "ANGLE", "COSINE"
30 (1) FOR I = 0 TO 2 STEP 0.1
40 (21) LET A = I * P
50 (21) LET C = COS(A)
60 (21) PRINT A, C
70 (21) NEXT I
99 (1) END
